scripts.build: vite build && node build-utils/post-build.js && node build-utils/copy-content-script.js
scripts.dev:ext: rm -rf dist && npm run build && node build-utils/check-content-script.js && npm run dev:watch
scripts.dev:ext:browser: rm -rf dist && npm run build && node build-utils/check-content-script.js && concurrently "npm run dev:watch" "npm run dev:serve"
scripts.dev:test: npm run build && ls -la dist && echo '-----' && cat dist/manifest.json
scripts.dev:clean: rm -rf dist web-ext-artifacts && npm run build && npm run build:ext
scripts.dev:ext:simple: rm -rf dist && vite build && node build-utils/copy-content-script.js && cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp public/favicon.ico dist/ && vite build --watch
scripts.dev:ext:simple:browser: rm -rf dist && vite build && node build-utils/copy-content-script.js && cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp public/favicon.ico dist/ && web-ext run --source-dir=./dist --target=chromium --browser-console
